message.content:
cs.NE, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a novel framework for recurrent neural networks (RNNs) to enhance information processing and transmission between adjacent RNNs' units. The proposed framework is evaluated on 6 datasets which fall into 3 different tasks, corresponding to text classification, image classification, and language modelling. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper also discusses the performance improvement of traditional RNNs, which suggests the sub-categories cs.LG (Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the experiments involve image classification, which suggests the sub-category cs.CV (Computer Vision).
